message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75:25 split. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. While I recognize the decreasing value of money, I believe this is a fair compromise given the potential for further losses in later rounds.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60:40 split. This maintains a balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
